column4: Is there a way to crack WPA2 using your GPU, that way I could brute force. I googled this but couldnt find a utility
i am testing security at home, im trying to prove to myself that i am secure

The longer the passPHRASE and the more numerics sprinkled into the phrase, the more secure you would be from brute force.  Brute force assumes that words are used...don't use words, us mnemonics consisting of alpha numerics.
